name: Call of Air - Guse's Fleet
tooltip:
Call of Air - Guse's FleetLevel 60

We must prepare the new fleet of War Riders, <race>! My riders are set to make a strike on the central battlefield; but first, I must wet their appetites - preparing them for the assault.

I need enough Stormpike Soldier Flesh to feed a fleet! Hundreds of pounds! Surely you can handle that, yes? Get going!

Requirements:
- Stormpike Soldier's Flesh
